body.description: Qualcomm Snapdragon 427 processor Quad-core 1.4GHz processor and 2GB of RAM deliver outstanding overall performance for opening and running applications, flipping through menus, running home screens and more. Android 8.0 Oreo OS Rapid operating system keeps you safe and secure on your mobile device. 4G LTE speed Provides fast Web connection for downloading apps, streaming content and staying connected with social media. 5.2" IPS HD touch screen Extra-large screen is matched with a slim body to comfortably fit in your hand. Offers 16:9 cinema-like screen ratio that's perfect for viewing of videos, photos and games. 8.0MP rear-facing camera Record your favorite memories with good resolutions, with enough detail for print. Also includes a front-facing 5.0MP camera for self-portraits and video. 16GB internal memory plus microSD slot Provides plenty of storage space for your contacts, music, photos, apps and more. Expand storage up to 128GB by adding a microSD card (sold separately). Use your smartphone as a mobile hotspot Share your 4G data connection with other compatible wireless devices. Listen to music and news with the included FM radio app Scan for new stations, store your favorites and record audio directly from the radio. Your fingerprint keeps your phone secure Hold your finger on the fingerprint sensor to unlock your phone. Access to Google Play Browse and download apps, magazines, books, movies, and television programs directly to your phone. Carrier locked to AT&T

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 273 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Motorola E5 Play is an outstanding smart phone and great value for under $100.
reviews.reviewText: This smart phone is exceeding my expectations on speed, responsiveness and features. Over a month owned and has performed flawlessly. No fingerprint sensor but honestly I was having issues with apps closing due on my old Moto e4 fingerprint scanning in error. I use the pattern to unlock which is simple and quick to unlock my Moto e5 Play. Buy it while you can. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It works great. You can not beat the price. Was thinking it was going to be cheaply made but turned out to be a great phone and the battery lasts a decent while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Before you buy...
reviews.reviewText: ...understand that the "sim card" included with this phone is not real. One of the reasons I bought this phone was to get a new number. Luckily this phone can use the sim card from my old phone, because that was my only choice. The phone itself is surprisingly nice for the price. If it came with an actual sim card, it would have been a five star deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love the phone...
reviews.reviewText: Great little phone for my needs - google, email, etc. Had to purchase a new sim card. The card that came with the phone did not work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basic, but you know if it's Moto it's quality
reviews.reviewText: I'm not too savvy on smartphone tech, but I do believe that the Motorola E5 is as good as they come for the price. I'd be the poorest of judges on how it would compare to other smartphones, but it would be the best compromise between a dumbphone and a A-spec smartphone. There is one thing I wish it had: file exploring via a PC. I've had to use Google Drive to download files I would like to have on it. But as far as local uploading and downloading to device from another device, I'm hardpressed to say it's there at all. Or maybe I haven't found out the trick behind it yet. However, with Internet functionality it may be a moot point. I would still give it 5/5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The phone did not work, the screen was either locked or was broken and did not respond to touch.
reviews.reviewText: I cant review it because it never worked and I can't return it because the time allowed for returning it to Amazon has passed before I attempted to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I order for of these phones which came with the sim cards. However, all four Sim cards were bad. I was not able to connect any of the Sim cards because they were previously activated. I had to spend an extra $40 on Sim cards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hope this phone is easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: Just got the phone set up yesterday, and I am not very good with technology. At the moment, I can turn the phone off and on -- and for me, that's a big step forward!
El teléfono venía bloqueado nunca lo pude usar solo como tableta pesimo

reviews.reviewTitle: No puedo activarlo se necesita un nip
reviews.reviewText: Vendedor externo! No sé cómo contactarlo! No funciona el celular necesito el nip es urgente que se comunique
